body_html:
You may be interested in sequential feature columns which were recently added:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/feature_column/python/feature_column/sequence_feature_column.py

These can be used with sequence_input_layer (also in that file).
body_text:
You may be interested in sequential feature columns which were recently added:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/feature_column/python/feature_column/sequence_feature_column.py
These can be used with sequence_input_layer (also in that file).
body:
You may be interested in sequential feature columns which were recently added:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/feature_column/python/feature_column/sequence_feature_column.py

These can be used with sequence_input_layer (also in that file).
